item.description:
Get your dollar bills ready! It's time to play some slots and tables.

We will be taking the bus down to Mohegan Sun for the day. We will be leaving around 9:30 from Boston, and the bus gets back at 5:15

http://www.sunshinebo....

Sunshine Travel conveniently offer 10 Daily bus departures to bring you to a legendary gaming experience at Mohegan Sun. Apart from just paying $15-$17 for the bus ticket fee, each person will also get a bonus of $40 towards their bets and a $20 dining certificate towards Mohegan Sun's vast choice of fine restaurants.

**This is an extremely good deal!!**
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting at the bus stop in Boston, MA.
item.name: Day Trip to Mohegan Sun
